metadata.title: CVE-2021-22204 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - high
metadata.description:
Improper neutralization of user data in the DjVu file format in ExifToolversions 7.44 and up allows arbitrary code execution when parsing themalicious image

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-22204` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libimage-exiftool-perl - 12.16+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libimage-exiftool-perl package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '12.16+dfsg-2').
